page.title: 06OWERMOIGNE NEWS/FEELINGS
page.content: FEAR OF THE POSSIBLE EFFECTS OF LIVING ONLY 2.5 MILES FROM THE WINFRITH ATOMIC ENERGY RESEARCH ESTABLISHMENT MEANS THAT INHABITANTS MAKE EVERY EFFORT TO OPPOSE ANY FUTURE DEVELOPMENT OF THIS SITE. THE{HEAVY} TRAFFIC ON THE{A352}CAUSES MUCH CONCERN,AND THE OLDER SCHOOL CHILDREN MUST FOR SAFETY,BE PICKED UP ON THE NEAR SIDE OF THE ROAD. AN ARMY VEHICLE RECENTLY DEMOLISHED OUR BUS SHELTER ON THIS ROAD. A SPEED LIMIT,BOTH THERE AND IN THE VILLAGE IS DESIRABLE,AS ARE STREET LIGHTS AND FURTHER PAVEMENTS.GAS IS NOW BEING INSTALLED IN OWERMOIGNE. TENSION BETWEEN THE YOUTH AND THE ELDERLY INHABITANTS HAS LED TO THE FORMATION OF{TWO}TEENAGE YOUTH GROUPS THIS YEAR.THERE IS A STRONG FEELING FOR THE{PRESERVATION}OF TREES AND WILDLIFE OF THE VILLAGE.
